ComicInfo.Summary:
With Virgil in the hospital, Mercy seeks vengeance and continues her search for the demon called Raum. But first she must reconcile with some past figurative demons before figuring out a way to defeat the seemingly undefeatable.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Edgar Salazar & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Gregbo Watson & Erick Arciniega | 2 | C | Cover C | Michael Dooney & Ula Mos | 3 | D | Cover D | Sabine Rich | 4 | Note: The digital edition (6/15/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
